item.title: CVE-2024-37405|2024-07-12T15:41:03.461Z -- rocket.chat -- rocket.chat
item.description: Livechat messages can be leaked by combining two NoSQL injections affecting livechat:loginByToken (pre-authentication) and livechat:loadHistory.
